            더 보기
            As a UI/UX Designer, you will be involved in every aspect of the product development process, from brainstorming the next great product innovation to tweaking pixels right before launch. You will be expected to utilize your full range of product design, interaction design, and visual design skills, and you will own the experience for a wide area of the Tridge product.

            RESPONSIBILITIES- Create mockups or wireframes for new features and improvements - Help conduct user interviews and tests, and iterate based on feedback - Work with engineering to ensure the final product reflects your vision - Work with data science to deliver insights in the most impactful way for our customers - Lead big-picture UX discussionsQUALIFICATION- Extensive experience designing usable experiences for web or mobile - Ability to design as an individual but within the framework of the team and product - Strong teamwork and communication skills - Passion for and ability to thrive in a fast-paced startup environment
